subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Visionaire, trained by Michael Matz, nipped Texas Wildcatter at the wire Saturday to capture the $250,000 Gotham at a foggy Aqueduct racetrack.
snippet: Visionaire, trained by Michael Matz, nipped Texas Wildcatter at the wire Saturday to capture the $250,000 Gotham at a foggy Aqueduct racetrack.
